C

callContestants(String) - Method in class bench.Bench
In coach life cycle, transition between "wait for referee command" and "assemble team".
callContestants(String) - Method in interface bench.ICoach
In coach life cycle, transition between "wait for referee command" and "assemble team".
callTrial() - Method in class bench.Bench
The referee must wait that all the coaches are waiting for the call trial and all the contestants are in the bench, then the referee can continue the trial, it will reset all the flags, the flag to the contestants selected in the Team A or B and set the coaches wait for call trial to zero.
callTrial() - Method in interface bench.IReferee
The referee must wait that all the coaches are waiting for the call trial and all the contestants are in the bench, then the referee can continue the trial, it will reset all the flags, the flag to the contestants selected in the Team A or B and set the coaches wait for call trial to zero.
Coach - Class in entities
Coach instance.
Coach(ICoach, ICoach, String) - Constructor for class entities.Coach
It will be passed to the Coach the methods of the bench and referee site that the coach have acess.
CoachState - Enum in entities
Coach state for the Coach.
Contestant - Class in entities
Contestant instance.
Contestant(IContestant, IContestant, IContestant, int, String) - Constructor for class entities.Contestant
It will be passed to the Contestant the methods of the bench and referee site that the contestant have acess.
ContestantState - Enum in entities
Contestant state of the contestant.
